name: AS2Secure - AS2 Php Lib
short_description: AS2Secure is a PHP Lib to allow you to send and receive AS2 message from partners. Based on OpenSSL, documents are SIGNED and CRYPTED to build SMIME messages ready to be sent over HTTP connection.
